languages.text: {n}В голосе бога прорезаются ревнивые нотки.{/n} "Вновь стать частью скомпрометированного проекта? Я видел, какие пути избрали мои техносоратники, и не готов больше довериться никому. За себя буду решать я, только я. Раз я не могу нести ношу Эсхатоса и не могу разделить ее — пусть сгинет в небытии".

{n}Jealously creeps into the god's voice:{/n} "Am I to become part of a compromised project again? I have seen the paths chosen by my tech-comrades, and I cannot put my trust in anyone anymore. I alone will decide for myself. Since I can neither carry the burden of Eschatos nor divide it, let it lapse into oblivion."
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе бога прорезаются ревнивые нотки.{/n} "Вновь стать частью скомпрометированного проекта? Я видел, какие пути избрали мои техносоратники, и не готов больше довериться никому. За себя буду решать я, только я. Раз я не могу нести ношу Эсхатоса и не могу разделить ее — пусть сгинет в небытии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jealously creeps into the god's voice.{/n} "Am I to become part of a compromised project again? I have seen the paths chosen by my tech-comrades, and I cannot put my trust in anyone anymore. I alone will decide for myself. Since I can neither carry the burden of Eschatos nor share it, let it lapse into oblivion."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}神の声に羨望が混じる。{/n}「また欠陥のあるプロジェクトの一員になるのか？技術同胞が選んだ道を見たのだ、もう誰も、何も信用できぬ。自分は己のみで決断を下す。エスカトの重責を負うことも、それを分割することも自分にはできない。ゆえに、エスカトは忘却に葬り去ろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Jealously creeps into the god's voice:{/n} "Am I to become part of a compromised project again? I have seen the paths chosen by my tech-comrades, and I cannot put my trust in anyone anymore. I alone will decide for myself. Since I can neither carry the burden of Eschatos nor divide it, let it lapse into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}神の声に羨望が混じる。{/n}「また欠陥のあるプロジェクトの一員になるのか？技術同胞が選んだ道を見たのだ、もう誰も、何も信用できぬ。自分は己のみで決断を下す。エスカトの重責を負うことも、それを分割することも自分にはできない。ゆえに、エスカトは忘却に葬り去ろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}神明的声音中渗入了嫉妒之意。{/n}“莫非我要再次成为这个失败项目的一部分吗？我已经看到了我的技术伙伴们所选择的道路，我也无法再信任任何人，我准备自己做出这个决定。既然我无法承担终焉审判的重担，也无法将它剥离，那就干脆让它消失吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jealously creeps into the god's voice:{/n} "Am I to become part of a compromised project again? I have seen the paths chosen by my tech-comrades, and I cannot put my trust in anyone anymore. I alone will decide for myself. Since I can neither carry the burden of Eschatos nor divide it, let it lapse into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}神明的声音中渗入了嫉妒之意。{/n}“莫非我要再次成为这个失败项目的一部分吗？我已经看到了我的技术伙伴们所选择的道路，我也无法再信任任何人，我准备自己做出这个决定。既然我无法承担终焉审判的重担，也无法将它剥离，那就干脆让它消失吧。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je devrais donc participer à nouveau à un projet compromis ? » {n}rétorque le dieu avec une pointe de contrariété.{/n} « Mes technoconfrères ont choisi leur voie, et je ne peux plus avoir confiance en personne. C'est à moi de décider. Puisque je ne peux ni supporter le fardeau d'Eschatos seul ni le diviser, qu'il sombre dans l'oubli. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jealously creeps into the god's voice:{/n} "Am I to become part of a compromised project again? I have seen the paths chosen by my tech-comrades, and I cannot put my trust in anyone anymore. I alone will decide for myself. Since I can neither carry the burden of Eschatos nor divide it, let it lapse into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: « Je devrais donc participer à nouveau à un projet compromis ? » {n}rétorque le dieu avec une pointe de contrariété.{/n} « Mes technoconfrères ont choisi leur voie, et je ne peux plus avoir confiance en personne. C'est à moi de décider. Puisque je ne peux ni supporter le fardeau d'Eschatos seul ni le diviser, qu'il sombre dans l'oubli. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz del dios adquiere un tono de envidia.{/n} «¿Debo formar parte de un proyecto mutuo otra vez? He visto los caminos que han tomado mis tecnocamaradas y soy incapaz de confiar en ninguno. Decidiré por mi cuenta. Ya que no puedo llevar la carga de Eschatos ni dividirla, que caiga en el olvido».
languages.original_text: {n}Jealously creeps into the god's voice:{/n} "Am I to become part of a compromised project again? I have seen the paths chosen by my tech-comrades, and I cannot put my trust in anyone anymore. I alone will decide for myself. Since I can neither carry the burden of Eschatos nor divide it, let it lapse into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del dios adquiere un tono de envidia.{/n} «¿Debo formar parte de un proyecto mutuo otra vez? He visto los caminos que han tomado mis tecnocamaradas y soy incapaz de confiar en ninguno. Decidiré por mi cuenta. Ya que no puedo llevar la carga de Eschatos ni dividirla, que caiga en el olvido».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Eifersucht kriecht in die Stimme des Gottes.{/n} "Soll ich wieder Teil eines kompromittierten Projekts werden? Ich habe gesehen, welche Pfade meine Techkameraden wählen, und ich kann mein Vertrauen in keinen davon mehr setzen. Ich allein entscheide. Da ich die Last von Eschatos weder schultern noch sie teilen kann, soll sie in Vergessenheit geraten."
languages.original_text: {n}Jealously creeps into the god's voice:{/n} "Am I to become part of a compromised project again? I have seen the paths chosen by my tech-comrades, and I cannot put my trust in anyone anymore. I alone will decide for myself. Since I can neither carry the burden of Eschatos nor divide it, let it lapse into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eifersucht kriecht in die Stimme des Gottes.{/n} "Soll ich wieder Teil eines kompromittierten Projekts werden? Ich habe gesehen, welche Pfade meine Techkameraden wählen, und ich kann mein Vertrauen in keinen davon mehr setzen. Ich allein entscheide. Da ich die Last von Eschatos weder schultern noch sie teilen kann, soll sie in Vergessenheit geraten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tanrının sesinde kıskançlık seziyorsun.{/n} "İşlevsel olmayan bir projenin parçası mı olacağım yeniden? Tekno yoldaşlarım tarafından seçilen yolları gördüm, artık hiç kimseye güvenemem. Kararımı kendim vereceğim. Madem Eskatos'un yükünü ne taşıyabiliyorum ne de bölebiliyorum, o hâlde sonsuzluğa karışsın."
languages.original_text: {n}Jealously creeps into the god's voice:{/n} "Am I to become part of a compromised project again? I have seen the paths chosen by my tech-comrades, and I cannot put my trust in anyone anymore. I alone will decide for myself. Since I can neither carry the burden of Eschatos nor divide it, let it lapse into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanrının sesinde kıskançlık sezilmeye başlıyor:{/n} "İşlevsel olmayan bir projenin bir parçası mı olacağım yeniden? Tekno yoldaşlarım tarafından seçilen yolları gördüm ve artık hiç kimseye güvenemem. Kararımı kendim vereceğim. Madem Eschatos'un yükünü ne taşıyabiliyorum ne de bölebiliyorum, o hâlde sonsuzluğa karışsın."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
